alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 12:58AM AKST until January 30 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations 2 inches possible. Winds could gust to 35 mph. Visibility one half mile or at times. Wind chills to 55 below. * WHERE...Central Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 9 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. Wind chills as low as 55 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
